changeSet.sql: UPDATE PATIENT_VEST_THERAPY_DATA therapy_data join (SELECT pvdd.timestamp,pvdd.serial_number,pvdd.bluetooth_id, pvdd.user_id FROM PATIENT_VEST_DEVICE_DATA pvdd join PATIENT_VEST_THERAPY_DATA pvtd on pvdd.timestamp = unix_timestamp(pvtd.start_time)*1000 and pvdd.user_id = pvtd.user_id) as device_data set therapy_data.serial_number = device_data.serial_number, therapy_data.bluetooth_id = device_data.bluetooth_id WHERE unix_timestamp(therapy_data.start_time)*1000 = device_data.timestamp and therapy_data.user_id = device_data.user_id; Adding serial_number and bluetooth_id to therapy data
